name: Sticky Ship
description:
Fight off aliens in this gluegunning adventure. play through ten levels of this retro arcade shooter to keep the aliens away from earth!

-Keyboard controls: circle -> 'z' , x -> 'x'., and use the arrow keys to move

-Gamepad: circle->b, x->a, and joystick/ d-pad for movement

-lore (spoilers, in menu)

Ack!

Aliens have begun attacking Earth and our weapons have no effect!  What are we going to do?!?  This is worse than that one time I accidentally put a plastic fork in the lasagna before putting it in the oven!  There was melted plastic everywhere! We had to throw out a big chunk of it… Just the absolute worst!  Anyways… 

Ack!  Aliens!

We can’t destroy their ships with normal means, but what if we turn their ships against each other?  We could give them the ol’ one two with their own tech!  Grab that conveniently placed glue gun and attach it to that ship!
